name: Zengarten
description:
Platformer with talking trees and a secret

Talk to all the other players via the plants! Discover your Zen while waiting for the plants to grow! Jump high and reach for the sky!

- designed and developed in 48 hours during the Franken Game Jam - 

Language: German

Controls: 

A/D to move

W to jump

E to plant seeds

Q to talk to plant - or maybe more?

R to remove a plant
